title: How to Keep Jealousy From Ruining Relationships
description:
One of the things that should set us apart as followers of Christ is that we would regard others more important than ourselves. This is how we’re built to love and be loved in our relationships. Hear from special guest Zac Allen about how he and Jennie cheer each other on in marriage and support each other in what God has made them to be.

Download the friend guide PDF: jennieallen.com

Become one of our texties by texting the word PODCAST to 214-225-6267
